author: Stitcher, Inc.
description: The Stitcher Radio app gives you on demand access to over 15,000 popular radio shows and podcasts from sources like NPR, CNN, Fox News, Wall Street Journal, BBC, Adam Carolla, and more. The web app syncs with Stitcher's mobile apps which were one of TechCrunch's "20 Best Apps of 2012". Listen to over 15,000+ radio shows and podcasts on demand with Stitcher Radio. Discover the best of news, entertainment, sports and talk radio. The fully featured web app will sync with the mobile app and pulls in all your custom stations, so you can seamlessly pick up where you left off listening wherever you are. KEY FEATURES: • Smart Discovery. Discover new shows you like based on your listening activity. The Smart Station draws from more than 15,000 shows and fine-tunes personalized recommendations. • On-demand listening. Get breaking news and your favorite episodes from Stitcher’s catalogue of more than 15,000 shows without the need to download or sync. You’ll always be up to date with the latest episodes and trending stories. • Customized stations. Log in and instantly access where you left off listening. • Facebook sharing. Discover what your friends are listening to, or share your favorite shows by connecting your Facebook account. • Sway.fm integration so you can "remote control" playback from your browser toolbar (installation of sway.fm extension required). AWARDS & PRAISE ★ TechCrunch "20 Best Apps of 2012" ★ Wired "Essential Driving App" 2012 ★ Apple Top 5 News App ★ CNET - Top 10 iPhone App 2013 ★ PC World – 12 Best Entertainment Apps of 2012 ★ Webby's People's Voice Award ★ PC Magazine Top 100 Apps ★ Best News App - Best App Ever Awards
name: Stitcher Radio
